languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс выдерживает паузу.{/n} "Если говорить об окружении — я все же спрошу кое о чем, что привлекло мое внимание".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс выдерживает паузу.{/n} "Если говорить об окружении — я все же спрошу кое о чем, что привлекло мое внимание".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for a moment, then:{/n} "Speaking of surroundings, I would like to ask you about something that caught my attention."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс выдерживает паузу.{/n} "Если говорить об окружении — я все же спрошу кое о чем, что привлекло мое внимание".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for a moment, then:{/n} "Speaking of surroundings, I would like to ask you about something that caught my attention."
{n}Heinrix says nothing for a moment, then:{/n} "Speaking of surroundings, I would like to ask you about something that caught my attention."
{n}Heinrix says nothing for a moment, then:{/n} "Speaking of surroundings, I would like to ask you about something that caught my attention."
{n}Heinrix says nothing for a moment, then:{/n} "Speaking of surroundings, I would like to ask you about something that caught my attention."

languages.text: {n}海因里希沉默半晌，之后开了口。{/n}“说到这里的环境，有件事情引起了我的注意，我想问一下。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for a moment, then:{/n} "Speaking of surroundings, I would like to ask you about something that caught my attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希沉默半晌，之后开了口。{/n}“说到这里的环境，有件事情引起了我的注意，我想问一下。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix tarda un tiempo en continuar:{/n} «Hablando del entorno, quería preguntarle por algo que me ha llamado la atención».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for a moment, then:{/n} "Speaking of surroundings, I would like to ask you about something that caught my attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix tarda un tiempo en continuar:{/n} «Hablando del entorno, quería preguntarle por algo que me ha llamado la atención».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、しばらく何も言わなかった。{/n}「環境といえば、俺が気になったことについて尋ねたいのだが」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for a moment, then:{/n} "Speaking of surroundings, I would like to ask you about something that caught my attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、しばらく何も言わなかった。{/n}「環境といえば、俺が気になったことについて尋ねたいのだが」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix garde le silence un moment avant de poursuivre :{/n} « En parlant d'environnement, quelque chose a retenu mon attention. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for a moment, then:{/n} "Speaking of surroundings, I would like to ask you about something that caught my attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix garde le silence un moment avant de poursuivre :{/n} « En parlant d'environnement, quelque chose a retenu mon attention. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix bleibt eine ganze Weile stumm, dann sagt er:{/n} "Apropos Umgebung, ich würde Euch gerne nach einer Sache fragen, die mir aufgefallen ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for a moment, then:{/n} "Speaking of surroundings, I would like to ask you about something that caught my attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix bleibt eine ganze Weile stumm, dann sagt er:{/n} "Apropos Umgebung, ich würde Euch gerne nach einer Sache fragen, die mir aufgefallen ist."

languages.text: {n}Bir süre hiçbir şey söylemeyen Heinrix, sonrasında konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Etraftakilerden bahsetmişken sana dikkatimi çeken bir şey hakkında soru sormak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for a moment, then:{/n} "Speaking of surroundings, I would like to ask you about something that caught my attention."
